page.title: 04Where do we work ?
page.content: Most people work in Nottingham, Mansfield or Newark, mainly at {management level}or running their{own {business.}The largest source of local employment is{argiculture}as most of the land is intensively cultivated. The{public houses}in Fiskerton, Morton and Rolleston and the{shop/post {offices}at Fiskerton and Rolleston also provide some local employment. The{boatyard,}Fiskerton Wharf, carries out boat building & repairs and hires out barges. Morton{garage}provides vehicle repair and maintainance work. {Oakdale Riding Centre,}Fiskerton and the{racecourse}at Rolleston also employ some people. There are small {joinery}firms at Morton and Rolleston and several{one man businesses}in the area. Some households employ{domestic {labour.}Unemployment is well below the national average.
